## ResolutionSession.runWithBinding() method

Run the given action with the given binding and session

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static runWithBinding(action: ResolutionAction, binding: Readonly<Binding>, session?: ResolutionSession): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  action | <code>ResolutionAction</code> | A function to do some work with the resolution session |
|  binding | <code>Readonly&lt;Binding&gt;</code> | The current binding |
|  session | <code>ResolutionSession</code> | The current resolution session |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
